title: The Performing bear
brief_description: A bankrupt travelling circus, a whip loving trainer, three businessmen, one innocent bear and a chance for freedom. All over the world animals are mistreated in the name of entertainment. Based on a true story, this short animation is about one of those animals, a bear, and his sudden chance for freedom.
